title: Laptop Shutting Down in the middle of the Game
body: About 10-15 mins in the game, computer shuts down randomly, i know its cause of overheating but i don't know what to do to fix it :/

replies.body:
Before you run LoL, try turning off every other application you have including any that are running in the background (open your system tray in the bottom right of your task bar and turn off what you can). Also try lowering all of your in game video settings to the minimal quality or turning them off.

Otherwise, in my own experience getting a [cooling pad](https://www.google.com.au/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&es_th=1&ie=UTF-8#q=laptop+cooling+pad) has helped. With their own fans and an increase in space below the lappy, I was able to get FFXIV:ARR running on a 2006 laptop which was otherwise overheating. You'd want a decent branded one rather than the crappy plastic ones you can pick up anywhere.

Alright, thanks, ill buy a cooling pad and see if it'll work, and also when i open up my battery percentage, it says "There is a problem with your battery, so your computer might shut down". Could this also be a problem?
